author: Crato von Crafftheim, Johannes, 1519-1585
title: Consiliorum et epistolarum medicinalium / Joh. Cratonis a Kraftheim ... et al.iorum ... medicorum, liber quintus ; nunc secundo labore & studio Laurentii Scholzii ... in lucem editus. [De morbo Gallico commentarius, nunc primum ... editus]
imprint: "Hanau: Wechel for D. & D. Aubry & C. Schleich, [1619]"
